name: Harold Han
description: Harold Han and his family were one of the victims of theFourth Corporate War. After the bomb turnedNight Cityinto shambles, Harold and his family moved into a shelter in order to survive and would walk for miles just to get clean water and food. Eventually the city began to rebuild, bringing back order and stability to Night City and Harold and his family were able to move into a proper house with all the benefits of modern day civilization. Harold, wanting to keep building Night City and make sure it never reverted back to chaos, joined theNCPDand eventually became a detective.Harold at some...
